name: Elementus (TiltedDen, lukependleton, hddempsey)
description:
Elementus is a 4-player co-op action/adventure platformer game centered around four magical heroes who possess arcane mastery of earth, fire, water, and air elements. Players are tasked with fighting enemies and solving puzzles. Players must be adept at combat and platforming to reclaim the Elementus stone.

The game was made by Harrison Dempsey, Luke Pendleton, Thomas Ramos, and Denny Yeung for a Game Development class called EECS 494 at University of Michigan. Special credits go towards the following people:

Music by Jacob Emery, Art by Cameron Seales, Voice Acting by Daeleth, Airick, Flashzoid
